name: Beach Bowling 3D
description:
INTRODUCTORY SALE!
Bowling & Beach = Love

Wake up, you're not dreaming! In Beach Bowling 3D beautiful bikini babes admire you from the audience as you roll strike after strike with expert skill. Around the clock Beach Bowling – you definitely won't find this anywhere else! Put your ability to the test in 5 different levels while marveling at fabulous 3D graphics and realistic game physics.

Want to grab the coveted cup in the final round? Then you’ll have to bowl your way to the right score! Simple touch and drag game controls allow for easy play with no hassle. Come and join us on the beach!

Features:

- awesome 3D graphics
- impressive Physics Engine
- realtime Day and Night cycles
- Online Highscore
- Achievement System

Gameplay Trailer:
http://tinyurl.com/BeachBowling
